definition: nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour

sentences.english: I also like to eat rice cakes.
Fried New Year cake is an unique method of eating New Year cakes.
sentences.chinese: 炒年糕是年糕的特色喫法。

sentences.english: Fried New Year cake is an unique method of eating New Year cakes.
sentences.chinese: 炒年糕是年糕的特色喫法。

sentences.english: In my hometown in Hubei Province, the holidays have a custom to eat rice cakes.
sentences.chinese: 在我的家鄉湖北，過節有喫年糕的習俗。

sentences.english: The above was the story of the rice-cake.
sentences.chinese: 如上所講的，就是這塊年糕的故事。

sentences.english: Rice cakes and giving each other the gift, to enhance the friends and relatives of love.
sentences.chinese: 年糕又是互相奉送的禮品，來增長親友摯友之情。

sentences.english: And potato, rice cakes, green onions, ginger, and fry.
sentences.chinese: 和山芋，年糕，大蔥，生薑等一起炒。

sentences.english: However, Southerners love to eat Rice Cake, meaning family reunion.
sentences.chinese: 然而，南方人喜歡喫年糕，意思是全家團圓。

sentences.english: Cakes of Suzhou Guanqian of Daoxiang cake as the best product.
sentences.chinese: 年糕以蘇州觀前街的稻香村年糕爲最佳品。

sentences.english: Cakes of Suzhou Guanqian of Daoxiang cake as the best product.
sentences.chinese: 年糕以蘇州觀前街的稻香村年糕爲最佳品。

sentences.english: In the future I'm going to be a Ddokboki seller.
sentences.chinese: 將來我會成爲一個賣辣炒年糕的小販。

sentences.english: Is it that hard to sell smaller bite-sized mochi to reduce the opportunity of choking?
sentences.chinese: 難道就不能出售很小的年糕來降低噎死的風險嗎？

sentences.english: Return the rice cakes and prepared chicken into wok.
The girl next to him was eating a rice cake. She wanted to be the Earth, she said.
sentences.chinese: 他旁邊的女孩在喫一塊年糕，她說她想做地球。

sentences.english: I have to admit that I am partial to the odd flavoured rice cake.
sentences.chinese: 我必須承認我鍾愛於這種奇怪的年糕。

definition: boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
fried radish cake (a type of dim sum, commonly called "turnip cake")
rice cake (typically made with glutinous rice flour and steamed)
yam paste (a snack in Chaozhou cuisine)
